      • getReadableOrderList

        ReadableOrderList getReadableOrderList(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store,
                                       com.salesmanager.core.model.customer.Customer customer,
                                       int start,
                                       int maxCount,
                                       com.salesmanager.core.model.reference.language.Language language)
                                throws java.lang.Exception

        Method used to fetch all orders associated with customer customer. It will used current customer ID to fetch all orders which has been placed by customer for current store.

        Parameters:
        customer - currently logged in customer
        store - store associated with current customer
        Returns:
        ReadableOrderList
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
